enb_long_title: Thirteenth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies of the UNFCCC
sentences: On the evening of Friday, 15 September, SBI adopted its report of the session (FCCC/SBI/2000/L.2).
Burkina Faso, speaking for the Africa Group, congratulated Chair Ashe on SBI's work.
He underscored the need to pay particular attention to the needs and situations of LDCs.

Noting that LDCs did not feel adequately involved in the work of the GEF, he said the SBI should request the GEF to focus in particular on Africa, taking into account the specific needs of each country, and taking a sub-regional approach to capacity building.
He expressed hope that COP-6 would produce a successful outcome.
The meeting was adjourned shortly after 8:00 pm.
